snippet: As the death toll passed 170, President Vladimir V. Putin declared a national day of mourning in Russia and promised financial compensation for the victims of flash floods.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin declares a national day of mourning and promises financial compensation for the victims of flash floods after touring the deluged region by air; federal Investigative Committee has opened a criminal inquiry and is examining the authorities responsible for emergency preparedness to determine if more should or could have been done to prevent the deaths of more than 150 people.
lead_paragraph: As the death toll passed 170, President Vladimir V. Putin declared a national day of mourning in Russia and promised financial compensation for the victims of flash floods.

headline.seo: Putin Tours Flood-Stricken Black Sea Region
headline.main: As Putin Tours Flooded Region, Questions of Negligence Arise
headline.print_headline: As Putin Tours Flooded Region, Questions of Negligence Arise
